articles.title: China accuses US of threatening peace after warship passes disputed reef - South China Morning Post
articles.description: China’s Southern Theatre Command says American combat ship entered waters near the Second Thomas Shoal, violating ‘China’s sovereignty and security’.
articles.content:
This fully illustrates that the US is the biggest threat to peace and stability in the South China Sea.
The USS Gabrielle Giffords, an Independence-class littoral combat ship, conducted combined ope… [+3130 chars]
